title: Having issues Patching 7.11? Click Here!
body:
Hey everyone,

Pulsefire Caitlyn gave us a glimpse of what could be in the far future, but why not take a little peek into the near future that is 7.11? Let's just peel back the curtains back a bit and see---

Oh.

http://i.imgur.com/IIIU1NJ.jpg

...Welp, on to more pressing matters! If you're having issue patching during 7.11 make sure to check out the information below or drop a comment! The Poro bros will be on top of it :)

------------------------------------------------

>#Why does the End of Game Stats screen take FOREVER to freakin' load?!

This might be due to the "Close Client During Game" option in the client.  This option makes the client close out when you enter a game, which means after the game it has to completely reboot to start.  Low Spec Mode should be enough to keep things running smoothly, so disable this option by entering the client, clicking the gear in the upper right hand corner, [and unchecking the box.](http://i.imgur.com/smwR8be.png)

>#I've  tried the Updated Client before, and it was sooooo laggy

We've made some massive changes to the Updated Client make it run as smoothly as possible, even on the proudest of potatoes.  Enable Low Spec Mode if it isn’t on already.  You can find out by clicking the gear in the upper right hand corner of the Updated Client and then [click "Enable Low Spec Mode"](http://i.imgur.com/rPGRnYW.png)

>#Patching Failed and we're not sure why Error: 004

This error usually occurs when Operating System Permissions isn't set properly.  Essentially, the patcher is trying to access files found on your hard drive, but it is being denied from doing so.  [Follow the steps in this guide to get this resolved!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

>#Something's up with our servers and it's preventing you from patching Error: 003

Occurs when the patcher isn't able to maintain a stable connection with our Patcher Servers.  If the patcher loses connection to the server to get the necessary files, it will simply stop working.  To get this resolved, [make sure to complete all of the solutions in this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

--------------------------------------

If you have a problem that isn’t here or those solutions aren’t working, drop a comment below and we’ll be sure to respond and help you out!  ^.^

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=dArtagnan,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ziqxhQk4,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-05-30T23:02:00.262+0000)
>
> Hey everyone,

> Pulsefire Caitlyn gave us a glimpse of what could be in the far future, but why not take a little peek into the near future that is 7.11? Let&#039;s just peel back the curtains back a bit and see---
> 
> Oh.
 yeah, yas is pretty perm bann
Heeeeeeey we aren't the ones picking the bans fam xD!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ziqxhQk4,comment-id=001b0000,timestamp=2017-06-10T01:39:03.535+0000)
>
> Heeeeeeey we aren't the ones picking the bans fam xD!

ik :(

So my issue doesn't truly revolve around the latest patch, its been an issue for quite some time now. I have a brand new custom built PC that I put together myself. Now my PC Plays everything under the son that's been released recently and if it was old by a few years or months. of course naturally i installed League immediately upon finishing the build and proceeded to lose games as I'm silver. But let me get to the point, when i was playing these games i had very decent FPS amounts. We are talking uncapped no V-Sync an easy 275-300+. But my problem as of i believe patch 7.3 or later or even earlier not sure, has rendered my FPS to a heaping 80--100 with super heavy fluctuation and crazy amounts of input lag. Abilities work fine and on time, it's the mouse movement that feel sluggish and delayed. i did some research and compared usage levels of my GPU (GTX-1060 3gb) in a triple a title and in league, I noticed in league i only use 45% of my GPU (but i know that's normal as this games not very taxing on Graphics) but in a triple a title such as The Witcher 3 I'm utilizing 95% and getting solid FPS 80-100, So now I ask the question, When do you guys plan on taking a deeper look into all the FPS complaints that are circling the web, as I'm sure I'm not the only one with a nice computer but cant seem to play a game that came out like 7 years ago. I just want to get back to smooth game play so i can lose on my terms not because the game felt like it was poorly optimized. Sorry for the long winded speech but as you can imagine this is rather frustrating.

It sounds like there might be a few different issues coming up for you here, and this might actually be happening from one of two possible issues. Let's go over that crazy lag first.

When you mentioned input lag, it makes me think that this could be some packet loss. We can find out for sure by using our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) and your recent game logs that had problems. Take a screenshot of what it says and shoot it my way so we can go over it together!
Thanks for the suggestions! I'll do my best to pass this along. I actually see a lot of good things with some of the points you listed too!
Give us 10 bans system now.. I'm currently on NA Draft Pick only finding myself a sequence 6 bans system
Why no 10 bans? Or is it not working? Also, item sets won't allow me to create?

Per the[ patch notes](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-711-notes#patch-ban-formats), it's going to be starting with Normal Draft on NA for now.  It will slowly be rolling out across regions and game modes to make sure everything is alright with each progression.  Item Sets look to be functional, I was able to just make a set!  You should be able to create a list in two ways:

Recommended Item Stes on the bottom of the **Items **pane.

Create an Empty set, **+** icon to the left of the Item Set Search field.

If you're running into any issues creating items, let me know what's going on with more detail.  Otherwise, hope this helps.  :D

>
> Per the[ patch notes](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-711-notes#patch-ban-formats), it's going to be starting with Normal Draft on NA for now.  It will slowly be rolling out across regions and game modes to make sure everything is alright with each progression.  Item Sets look to be functional, I was able to just make a set! >

>

Understood, but it's not there? It says it's live while, in fact, it is only 6 bans? I'm in NA...and tried to create but, the button is unclickable?

Porocles she is unable to click the create button she can select her item sets from the old client and edit those. The create button appears grey out and unclickable. she has tried to restarting the client but it did not help.
guys ...my loading screen is taking forever wheni want to log in the game ..and i can't see champs when i get in too champ select ...what to do ?

My first suggestion here would be to run [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) mode in case the aesthetics during champion select is causing problems loading your assets.  

Test it in a custom though to prevent any penalties.  If the problem continues, download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and run a repair to fix up any bad game files that could be causing delays in loading the match or any assets.  Let me know if that helps!

That's a pretty odd error get.  In this case, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can look into this with you.  The HRT should also have provided some logs for context which you can attach to that ticket.  We'll see you there!
Rito doesnt care

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/1nKl5FPz-cannot-patch-to-711-play-bar-just-stays-grey

Please address this issue that some of us are getting.  We can't patch the game..

It sounds like either the patch didn't download correctly or your network might be having a hard time getting connected to our servers. Let's make sure the patch worked correctly first since that's a much quicker fix. Grab this [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run a Force Repatch and let me know if you can get back on the Rift.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ziqxhQk4,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2017-06-01T23:39:51.994+0000)
>
>Grab this [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run a Force Repatch and let me know if you can get back on the Rift.

Well, I was finally able to work through this problem on my own.  Here are some things I learned about it through my own experience.

1. The Hextech Repair Tool was not deleting things properly.  In fact, I was unable to delete the old files and folders manually (despite being Admin) due to the system preventing deletion.  I am guessing that the culprit was some process or other which refused to die.
2. After uninstalling, I had to restart my computer and then delete the files/folders manually.
3. Only after complete deletion was I able to manage a "clean" installation.  This (finally) allowed proper patching to proceed as normal.  

The only error messages I was getting out of the HRT were those connected with sync'ing the system clock.  It kept telling me that I needed Admin permission to sync the clock, but the HRT is an .MSI file and therefore runs at Admin level.  In any case, I suspect that others having this "failed patcher" issue will need to follow the same steps I took.

Hiya. I've been playing quite a bit recently and have run into the same problem over and over again when I try to open up the client. Usually I have to launch it a few times before it actually launches which is fine, but then I get a message saying: [ https://prnt.sc/fga63f ] ( A screenshot of what I get ). Afterwards, I click "OKAY" and it then counts down to restart and then _attempts_ to begin the process. Of restoring my client to the latest patch. However, this is very tedious for it to do this every time. It pauses for a good 10 minutes on being "24.2 MB / 24.6 MB". But eventually finished. Sadly, whenever I launch now and restart, I get this [ https://prnt.sc/fga6he ]. It doesn't start restoring or anything. I'm quite tired of this. I used the Hextech Repair Tool 3 times now and I've shut down my computer and restarted it and what not. I just uninstalled. Please tell me that there's a way to fix this. I am about to uninstall then reinstall the whole game right now. If this doesn't help, I will be coming back to this thread for sure. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

When you do try reinstalling, make sure to do it using this [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) with the options **reinstall and clean uninstall** turned on. That way you're sure to remove any corrupted files and get a fresh clean install.
Thank you, Broporo. Will make sure to do so. Should I run the Hextech Repair Tool  before or after I reinstall the client?
It's a little late probably, but use the Hextech Repair Tool to do the reinstall. Once you have the tool you can use the options **reinstall and clean uninstall** to make sure it reinstalls properly!

fix my game
i can't create a lobby

it says on the PLAY button "We aren't able to create a lobby right now. Please exit the client and re-open it to try again." I did re-open it 10 times and also ran it as an administrator but still got the same results.
I saw some posts about this, but haven't heard back for additional info.  I'm assuming everything is okay now, but let me know!
I deleted the game and installed it again and now the launcher wont come out like when I clicked it the LOL logo will pop up but the launcher wouldnt. I even tried it to run as administrator.

After finishing a match of league I hit continue to move on to the Post game stats page. My post game stats page will not even come up and I'm left with an Icon in the system tray that has no options if I right click on it, and the only way I can get back to League is to close the now empty "running" league client by  restarting my computer. I am unable to report anyone, Honor anyone, or add anyone. I've tried reinstalling twice and clicking on repair more than twice but it still doesn't work.

You might have **close client during game** turned on in the client options. Try hitting the gear icon in the upper right corner, and you should see the option at the top of the menu. Make sure that is **unchecked** and let me know if that let's you see the post game lobby!

It was not checked the whole time. But I've just turning on the close client during game before playing and the client/post game lobby actually appeared after match instead. However since it kind of work when I on the close client during game, I guess its not a problem anymore. Thanks ^^
My game says that its going to the old version and then wont let me play in any games. It does let me log in but wont let me play.

Your client probably noticed some of it's files were damaged so it needs to repatch in order to make sure those files are still working correctly. If that patch doesn't ever seem to start, try grabbing this [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and running it with a **force repatch**.
My post has been removed and i dont know how to back what i typed
It tell me. That my game is going to the old patch and then wont let me play a game. it wont let me launch.

I'm just going to copy from my previous thread to get more traction for my issue:
"As soon as I open the client, it gives me an ambiguous error message that says the client has reverted to the last patch and will attempt to re-patch. It never tries to re-patch, and just sits there, stagnating and wasting my time, not allowing me to join any games. I am currently running a 'full repair,' but if my past experiences with client issues still bear relevance, this will not help anything. Re-patching with the Hextech repair tool has done nothing. Help would be very much appreciated.

UPDATE: The 'full repair' tool has repaired nothing. The full text in the pop-up is 'We have restored this installation to an older version of League of Legends. Now we'll try to patch it up to the latest version.' As I said prior, it does nothing."

It sounds like the repair tool wants to fix up your game files and get you updated, but something is blocking that from happening.  I recommend running through each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide in case security settings or anti virus is blocking your game files from being read and accessed.  Once you've gone through that, run the repair again for the fix.  Let me know if that helps out.  :D

One awesome note before patching your game would be to know how much the actual patch is, 1 gb - 4 gb - 7 gb? Sure at the start of the patch, it gives you an idea of an amount in a packed stage, not unpacked. This is one thing that I'm sure plenty of users suffer if their game resides on another drive. (I know, plenty are just gonna answer, get a bigger drive) However with league just starting to implement a way for their client to patch files while it's on the simple loadup screen. Pretty sad to be honest when many other popular games do patch while you play or let you know the exact a - z on what the entirety of the patch is.

Similar to this: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/ziqxhQk4-having-issues-patching-711-click-here?comment=0008

Like the usual auto answer most will give is: it's your connection , but what if it's not? No, it is. No it's not. The one thing that not one soul will fully attempt to answer. So for example, what if you had a 1 GB connection, fully ported and fully functional with all games but this one?

Since when does a 24.8 Mb turn into a GB of data? The compression rate with riots files are a bit baffling for a p2p connection.

Generally speaking, our patches are usually around 100-300 mb.  Its been higher recently due to getting all the files for LCU, but the last two have been pretty low around 150.  Specifically for this patch, it was 115.3mb.

As to why the patcher needs to download files bigger or more than this?  It has to do with how the patcher works.  Everytime there is a deploy, the patch does a type of self-check on itself to see if it has all the files it needs or if any are corrupted or missing.  If it finds files missing or corrupted, it identifies it and re-downloads it.  As to what causes this corruption, its hard to say specifically since every case is different.

Also since you mentioned it, our patcher does not use p2p connections (for NA) at all.  We used to years ago, but we stopped around 2013.

Are you experiencing any specific issues this patch?  Reply back and let me know!
I recently re-download it and after all the patches updates, it simply wont  od anything when I clicked on the launch button

That's most likely happening because your OS doesn't recognize League anymore after the patch and is shutting it down before it has the chance to open. You can get things working correctly again pretty easily by looking over your [**permission settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions), but if you have any problems along the way don't hesitate to let me know! ^_^
I tried everything said on the page and nothing works, There was once a window pops up saying the pvp.net has errors.thx

What happened to that Mac 2007 client issues Porocles had made?

I tried to launch LoL today and while it finally began showing the new client, I assumed the issue for me and other 2007 Mac users was fixed. However, when patching (at the log in screen) the % gets to 75 and then it starts to actually go down instead of up!

Weeeeeiiiiiiiird.....you're telling me that you can watch the patch go in reverse? That definitely shouldn't be happening. If you could actually grab a video of that happening I'll be able to better see what's happening and make sure we get this figured out!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ziqxhQk4,comment-id=000b0000,timestamp=2017-06-02T03:53:52.294+0000)
>
> Weeeeeiiiiiiiird.....you're telling me that you can watch the patch go in reverse? That definitely shouldn't be happening. If you could actually grab a video of that happening I'll be able to better see what's happening and make sure we get this figured out!

I decided to let it continue and see what would happen, after about an hour and a half (I left the room at points) I came back to see it at 97 percent and then after 8 or so minutes it finally finished. Only other issue I'm seeing now in my first game is my fps are sticking at 30 instead of the usual 60 I used to get. =/

When this patch came out and I tried to launch the game there was a 24.8 Mb update if I remember exactly.. I left the launcher to update and my internet stopped for a minute so when it came back I pressed retry and now I've a 1065 Mb update although I downloaded those about a week ago.
I've tried restarting the game and my PC but it appears that the game is stuck with this 1065 Mb update, Once I start it scans few files then says Upgrading your client (1042 Mb) then it jumps to 1065 Mb and starts downloading I've tried to wait till there's 1040 Mb left if the rest is just useless text but it isn't.

The reason why I can't just wait because my connection is slow and I can't keep my PC open few hours for a patch that isn't necessary... Please help.

Hrrrrmmmm it kind of sounds as if your network is having a really hard time getting the latest patch. You should be able to speed that up a bit if you switch to a hardwired connection, but let's also double check some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) just to be safe. Let me know if that doesn't seem to help much though!
